participant_2.background:
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
My husband and I love working with our hands and building things together.
My father died when I was young, but I grew up knowing my mother and my siblings.
my weekends are filled with bird watching.

content.text: Hi! I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos. What are you up to today?
Hi! I'm working at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
That's really cool! How long have you been working at the coffee shop?
For about a year now. I started working there to save up money for acting school.
That's a great idea! I've always wanted to be an actress.
You should go for it! It's a lot of hard work, but it's so rewarding.
Thanks for the encouragement! I think I might just do that.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll be great.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to run, read, and watch movies.
Those sound like fun things to do! I love to read and watch movies too.
Me too! I'm currently reading a book called "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
I love that book! It's one of my favorites.
Me too! I'm really enjoying it.
So, what's your favorite movie?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorite movies, but I think I'd have to say "The Princess Bride".
That's a great movie! I love it too.
Me too! It's so funny and heartwarming.
Yeah, it is. I love the story.
Me too! I think it's a really great movie.
I agree! It's one of my favorites too.
